location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Henry Moore, East India Company Agent at Bussora [Basra], and his assistant, John Beaumont, to James Morley, East India Company Resident at Bushire, and his assistant, George Green

mods.abstract: The letter discusses confusion in the orders given to Lieutenant McKenly, commander of the Fancy,andcontains an assurance that cash will be sent from Basra as soon as possible.
